channel.title: CVE Feed for Theme Freesia -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34376|2024-06-12T20:20:12.031Z -- theme%20freesia -- edge
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme Freesia Edge allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Edge: from n/a through 2.0.9.
